channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report E-2024040119
item.description:
Report E-2024040119

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-09T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-04
  • City: CHARLOTTE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 6500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal NCH experienced a UN1824 Greasestrip Plus release from a box containing (4) 1-gallon poly jugs as well as a release of UN3264 Lime-A-Way from a box containing (4) 1-gallon poly jugs. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 2-gallons of each product, (4-gallons combined) released to a 4’ x 4’ area of the trailer floor due to a forklift puncture. Soda ash solution and oil dri were deployed to clean and neutralize the impacted area. All impacted absorbents, cardboard, PPE, and the two empty pails of UN3264 Lime-A-Way were placed into a 55-gallon poly drum. The two empty jugs, and two damaged jugs of UN1824 Greasestrip Plus were placed into a separate 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.

item.title: Report E-2024040005
item.description:
Report E-2024040005

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-03T15:11:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-14
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal NWN. It was reported that approximately 1 gallon of PPG White Primer was released from one 5-gallon plastic pail due to improper loading by terminal XML. The release impacted trailer #3173809.
